be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.LoginController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginViewController.ViewListener

    public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoginViewController.ViewListener
    Handle the logic of the login of a user This class is the listener of the LoginViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the LoginView.fxml view.
